title: Claude Code Skills
text: Skills extend Claude Code’s capabilities for this course. Install these skills to enable specialized functionality for data analysis and research.

title: Claude Code Skills
text:
Course Instructions (CLAUDE.md)
The CLAUDE.md file contains important course-specific instructions for Claude Code. This file tells Claude to use the rice-data-query skill for all Rice database queries.
Download: CLAUDE.md
Installation location: .claude/CLAUDE.md

title: Claude Code Skills
text:
Quick Installation
The easiest way to install skills is to ask Claude Code to do it for you:
Tell Claude Code:
"Download and install the rice-data-query skill and CLAUDE.md
from mgmt638.kerryback.com/skills/"
Claude Code will download the files and place them in the correct location.

title: Claude Code Skills
text:
Manual Installation
If you prefer to install manually, follow these steps:

1. Directory Structure
Skills must be placed in .claude/skills/ within your course folder:
your-course-folder/
├── .claude/
│   └── skills/
│       ├── rice-data-query/
│       │   ├── SKILL.md
│       │   └── README.md
│       └── momentum-calculator/
│           ├── SKILL.md
│           ├── README.md
│           └── calculate_momentum.py


2. Create the Directory
In your course folder, create the skills directory:
Mac/Linux:
mkdir -p .claude/skills
Windows (PowerShell):
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .claude\skills -Force


3. Download Skills
Click the links below to download each skill file, then place them in the appropriate folder.

title: Claude Code Skills
text:
Available Skills

Rice Data Query
Query the Rice Business Stock Market Data Portal using natural language. This skill enables Claude Code to fetch stock prices, fundamentals, insider trades, and other financial data.
Files to download:

SKILL.md - Skill definition
README.md - Documentation

Installation location: .claude/skills/rice-data-query/
What it does:

Generates SQL queries for the Rice Data Portal
Handles date formatting and window functions
Saves data as parquet files
Provides detailed database schema information

Example usage:
"Get end-of-month adjusted closing prices for AAPL since 2020 from the Rice database"



Momentum Calculator
Calculate stock momentum from month-end prices using the Jegadeesh & Titman methodology.
Files to download:

SKILL.md - Skill definition
README.md - Documentation
calculate_momentum.py - Python script

Installation location: .claude/skills/momentum-calculator/
What it does:

Calculates momentum as closeadj(t-2) / closeadj(t-13) - 1
Groups by ticker automatically
Converts dates to pandas Period format
Saves results as parquet files

Example usage:
"Calculate momentum from my month_end_prices.parquet file"

title: Claude Code Skills
text:
Verification
After installation, verify the skills are installed correctly:
Tell Claude Code:
"List the skills in .claude/skills/"
You should see both rice-data-query and momentum-calculator folders with their respective files.

title: Claude Code Skills
text:
Getting Help
Each skill includes a README.md file with detailed documentation. If you encounter issues:

Check that files are in the correct directory (.claude/skills/)
Ensure all required files are present for each skill
Restart Claude Code if skills don’t appear immediately
Ask Claude Code to check the skill installation

title: Claude Code Skills
text:
Prerequisites

Rice Data Query
Before using this skill, you need:

An access token from the Rice Data Portal
A .env file in your course folder with:
RICE_ACCESS_TOKEN=your_token_here

Claude Code can help you create the .env file once you have your token.


Momentum Calculator
Requires:

Python 3.x with pandas and pyarrow installed
Month-end price data in parquet format with columns: ticker, date, closeadj
